00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.Web.Netflix
00029 {
00033     public class Titles
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00041         public Titles(string XMLContent)
00042         {
00043             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00044             Document.LoadXml(XMLContent);
00045             TitleList = new List<Title>();
00046 
00047             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00048             {
00049                 if (Children.Name.Equals("catalog_titles", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)
00050                     || Children.Name.Equals("similars", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051                 {
00052                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00053                     {
00054                         if (Child.Name.Equals("catalog_title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)
00055                             || Child.Name.Equals("similars_item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00056                         {
00057                             TitleList.Add(new Title((XmlElement)Child));
00058                         }
00059                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("number_of_results", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00060                         {
00061                             NumberOfResults = int.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00062                         }
00063                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("start_index", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00064                         {
00065                             StartIndex = int.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00066                         }
00067                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("results_per_page", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00068                         {
00069                             ResultsPerPage = int.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00070                         }
00071                     }
00072                 }
00073             }
00074         }
00075 
00076         #endregion
00077 
00078         #region Properties
00079 
00083         public int NumberOfResults { get; set; }
00084 
00088         public int StartIndex { get; set; }
00089 
00093         public int ResultsPerPage { get; set; }
00094 
00098         public List<Title> TitleList { get; set; }
00099 
00100         #endregion
00101     }
00102 }
